akn:section.akn:heading: Undefinitized contractual actions: required description of anticipated effect on military department

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 3371. Undefinitized contractual actions: required description of anticipated effect on military department requirements if use of undefinitized contractual action results in delay The head of an agency may not enter into an undefinitized contractual action unless the request to the head of the agency for authorization of the contractual action includes a description of the anticipated effect on requirements of the military department concerned if a delay is incurred for purposes of determining contractual terms, specifications, and price before performance is begun under the contractual action. (Added and amended Pub. L. 116–283, div. A, title XVIII, § 1819(a), (b), Jan. 1, 2021, 134 Stat. 4189.)
